description: Fill in your insurance premium tax return form online

sections.title: About you
sections.description: Provide your information before telling us about your business

fields.label: Your first name
Your last name
Telephone number
fields.helpText: If this is a UK landline or an overseas number, you must include the area or dialling code.

fields.label: Position in the company
fields.helpText: For example: director, company, secretary, agent

fields.label: Name of business
Return period start date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 01/10/2016.

fields.label: Return period end date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 31/12/2016.

fields.label: Standard rate IPT due for this period
fields.helpText: You should deduct any standard credits that are due to you.

fields.label: Higher rate IPT due for this period
Do you have any underdeclarations of IPT or overdeclarations of credit from any previous returns?
Is the underdeclared amount £10,000 or less?
Is the undeclared amount between £10,000 and £50,000 but no more than 1% of the net value of taxable premiums (excluding tax) for this period?
optionHelpText: For amounts above £50,000 and those above £10,000 that exceed 1% of the net value of taxable premiums, you must notify us separately.

fields.label: Underdeclarations of standard rate IPT from previous periods
fields.helpText: Enter the total of any underdeclarations of tax due at the standard rate and overdeclarations of credit from any previous returns.

fields.label: Underdeclarations of higher rate IPT from previous periods
fields.helpText: Enter the total, as above, but for any underdeclarations of IPT at the higher rate.

fields.label: Do you have any overdeclarations of IPT from any previous returns?
Is the overdeclared amount £10,000 or less?
Is the overdeclared amount between £10,000 and £50,000 but no more than 1% of the net value of taxable premiums (excluding tax) for this period?
optionHelpText: For amounts above £50,000 and those above £10,000 that exceed 1% of the net value of taxable premiums, you must notify us separately.

fields.label: Overdeclarations of standard rate IPT from previous periods
fields.helpText: Enter the total of any underdeclarations of tax due at the standard rate and overdeclarations of credit from any previous returns.

fields.label: Overdeclarations of higher rate IPT from previous periods
fields.helpText: Enter the total, as above, but for any underdeclarations of IPT at the higher rate.

fields.label: Net value of taxable premiums (excluding tax)
fields.helpText: Deduct the net value of any reductions in premium or lapses for which you are claiming credit on this return.

fields.label: Are you using a special accounting scheme?
Acknowledgement copy
